t:
My daughter asked to check for monsters under the bed.


As I lie paralysed under her bed, the thing that looks like me smiles and says,
  “There's nothing there, darling.”
c:
My twin brother tells me next, “You can no longer hurt your daughter.”



#daughter #monster #bed #lookalike #imposter #danger #paralyzed #ignorance





https://www.cbsnews.com/news/teresa-sievers-murder-husband-mark-lookalike/ and the old story of a boy asking to check for monster under bed.
